thread.title: Save £5 at McColl's

author: The Telegraph
title: Save £5 at McColl's
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with McColl's to offer readers £5 off when you spend £15 in Mccoll's convenience stores nationwide. McColl's offer an array of handy everyday products, including cards, stationery, magazines, health and beauty products, as well as a variety of drinks and snacks to enjoy while you are out and about. They also offer a range of services including Lottery, Post Office*, Collect Plus* and Paypoint. To find your nearest store, click here and use the online store locator. How to claim See the newspaper on Saturday, September 26, 2015 **Exclusions apply: Tobacco, Stamps, Gift Cards, Infant formula milk, Lottery tickets and games, mobile top ups, E top ups, Bill Payments, Newspaper Delivery, Fuel and Cashback telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
